analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BonusCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#629-642):
	External calls:
	- super.buyTokens(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#641)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rate (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#642)

Reentrancy in BoutsCrowdsale.mintPresaleTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#979-984):
	External calls:
	- mintTokens(presaleWallet,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#981)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#369-386) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#382)

BoutsCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#955-971) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(remainingTokensWallet,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#963-964)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol#966)

BoutsCrowdsale.transferPresaleTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(destination,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol)

BoutsCrowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x903c7af702000b58baee44366815119fd39b2e3d.sol)
